name: phin
description: Ultra-simple, lightweight, dependency-free Node.JS HTTP request client

scripts.gendocs: rm -r docs || true && jsdoc -R README.md -d ./docs lib/phin.js
scripts.compile: npx babel lib/phin.js --out-file lib/phin.compiled.js --presets env --minified --no-comments && npx babel tests/test.js --out-file tests/test.compiled.js --presets env --minified --no-comments

author: Ethan Davis
